file(REAL_PATH "../icu/icu4c/source" ICU_SOURCE_DIR BASE_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(ICU_i18n STATIC)
set_target_properties(ICU_i18n PROPERTIES
	EXPORT_NAME ${I18N_STUBNAME}
	OUTPUT_NAME
		${STATIC_PREFIX}${ICULIBS_I18N}${ICULIBSUFFIX_DEBUG}
	RUNTIME_OUTPUT_NAME
		${STATIC_PREFIX}${ICULIBS_I18N}${ICULIBSUFFIX_VERSION}${ICULIBSUFFIX_DEBUG}
)
target_compile_definitions(ICU_i18n PRIVATE U_I18N_IMPLEMENTATION)
file(GLOB_RECURSE ICU_I18N_SOURCE_FILES "${ICU_SOURCE_DIR}/i18n/*.cpp")
target_sources(ICU_i18n PRIVATE ${ICU_I18N_SOURCE_FILES})
target_include_directories(ICU_i18n PUBLIC "${ICU_SOURCE_DIR}/i18n")
target_link_libraries(ICU_i18n PUBLIC ICU_common)

add_library(ICU::i18n ALIAS ICU_i18n)
